title: The Education of Henry Adams - best characterizes

content.question: Which of the following best characterizes the sentences "Among senses...afterwards"?

choices.label: Language that is understated and spare
Evocative details that are arranged systematically
An argument that is provocative but ultimately specious
A description that alternates between subjective impressions and fact

content.answer: Evocative details that are arranged systematically

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
